definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: perh. what is crumbled or easily crumbles, crumb (cf. [[נְקֻדָּה]]);—only pl.

crumbs: [[כּׂל לֶחֶם חֵידָם יׇâֵבשׁ הָיׇה נִקֻּדִים]] Jos 9:5 all the bread of their provision was dry (and) become crumbs (LXX bebrwme/nov[oi]; Targum in frusta comminuti), cf. ´[[יׇבֵשׁ וְהָיׇה נ]] v:Jos 9:12 (v. Di Benn).
appar. a kind of (hard) biscuit or cake 1Ki 14:3 (brought as present; + [[לֶחֶם]], etc.).
